steps.stepsection: In /home/ke/practice/xml/dita create dita trial files based on example from ~/dita-ot/DITA-OT1.5.4/doc/userguide.pdf: trial1.ditamap, trial1t.xml, trial1ant.xml

step.cmd: in dita-ot dir, run ./startcmd.sh which establishes a shell (DITA_HOME added in startcmd.sh)
on the just opened shell, run ant -f /home/ke/practice/xml/dita/trial1ant.xml

taskbody.result: According to the settings in trial1ant.xml, a pdf file trial1a.pdf (same name as the input trial1a.ditamap with ditamap replaced by pdf) is generated in /home/ke/practice/xml/dita/out.Try <draft-comment>
